channel.title: JAD question [delta] rep++
channel.description: When entering fight pits, what enables the user so that when he enters nobody else can come fight with him and he doesn't see anybody else even if multiple people are doing jad at the same time? I'll rep++ if you point me to the code or something.

item.title: JAD question [delta] rep++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:416526”]Well, for lack of better words, the map is reloaded every 4 height levels.
0 - Ground floor
1 - First floor
2 - Second floor
3 - Third floor
4 - Ground floor (new)
5 - First floor (new)
etc.

As for the player ID, its the index that’s assigned to all players on login.[/quote]
Ahh i see. Thanks a lot ;).

Read full topic

item.title: JAD question [delta] rep++
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well, for lack of better words, the map is reloaded every 4 height levels.
0 - Ground floor
1 - First floor
2 - Second floor
3 - Third floor
4 - Ground floor (new)
5 - First floor (new)
etc.

As for the player ID, its the index that’s assigned to all players on login.

Read full topic

item.title: JAD question [delta] rep++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:416526”]The height level of the player changes to their playerId multiplied by 4.

I thought that whenever you change the heightlevel you are elevated above the normal map, why doesn’t that affect this? And what do you mean their “playerid”.

Read full topic

item.title: JAD question [delta] rep++
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

The height level of the player changes to their playerId multiplied by 4.
